title: Billy Vigar: FA to conduct safety review after death of ex-Arsenal academy player
description: Billy Vigar, who made one appearance in the EFL Trophy for Arsenal, died on Thursday after suffering a brain injury.
content:
The FA will review the safety of walls surrounding pitches at lower-league football grounds after the death of former Arsenal academy player Billy Vigar.
The 21-year-old died on Thursday after sustaining a "significant brain injury" while playing for... [2264 chars]

title: Ryder Cup: Donald Trump arrives at Bethpage Black to support USA against Europe
description: US president Donald Trump arrives to watch the fourballs on day one of the Ryder Cup amid a partisan atmosphere at Bethpage Black.
content:
US president Donald Trump arrived to watch the Ryder Cup amid a partisan atmosphere on day one at Bethpage Black.
Air Force One flew over the course just outside New York at approximately 11:00 local time (16:00 BST) and landed at a nearby airport.

title: Thousands on antidepressants could be at risk of life-threatening heart problems if they are taking another common drug, experts warn
description: A new study has revealed taking anti-depressants with a common medication can cause heart problems.
content:
Thousands of patients in the UK could be at risk from dangerous drug interactions, doctors have warned—after new research found that taking antidepressants alongside beta blockers may trigger life-threatening heart problems.

title: Samsung's Galaxy TriFold wants to be your tablet and PC in leaked animations
description: Another set of leaked TriFold animations shows off the phone's laser focus on multitasking and more.
content:

title: Russia economy meltdown as Putin forced into humiliating tax move
description: Moscow is having to make fiscal changes to cope with the amount of cash being spent on its invasion of Ukraine.
content: Vladimir Putin is being forced to increase some taxes to fund "defence and security" as Russia reportedly plans to allocate less funds to the sector next year. The country's finance ministry announced an increase in value-added tax (VAT) from 20% to ... [2671 chars]
